actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the pledge of allegiance to the flag of the United States shall be rendered at the beginning of each legislative day in the House.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the pledge of allegiance to the flag of the United States shall be rendered at the beginning of each legislative day in the House.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the pledge of allegiance to the flag of the United States shall be rendered at the beginning of each legislative day in the House.
